content: कंदः --दं {@--1@} A bulbous root. {@--2@} A bulb; <ls>Bh. 3. 69</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); ज्ञानकंद. {@--3@} Garlic. {@--4@} A knot, swelling. {@--5@} An affection of the male or female organ. --दः {@--1@} A cloud. {@--2@} Camphor.
